description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Broccolini & Solanato Tomatoes with Lemon Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Roast,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Lemon,Broccolini,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato
name: Roasted Broccolini & Solanato Tomatoes with Lemon Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C fan forced. Spread the Broccolini® over the base of a roasting pan.
Mix the oil and honey together then pour over the Broccolini®, turn to coat, then spread the Broccolini® out in a single layer. Place lemon halves into the pan, cut side down.

Roast for 12 minutes, turning twice or until Broccolini® is almost tender. Add the tomatoes and roast for a further 5 minutes. Meanwhile, toast the sesame seeds in a small non-stick frying pan over high heat until lightly golden.
Squeeze the soft roasted lemon over the Broccolini® and tomatoes, sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
